scriptLines: joinFactKPI derive(InsertOrUpdate = iif(isNull(getFactKpi@OrganisationID) && isNull(getFactKpi@ScenarioID) && isNull(getFactKpi@MonthYearID) && isNull(getFactKpi@CostCenter)  && isNull(getFactKpi@PeopleType)

sources.name: getMBRData
sources.description: Retrieve data from the raw MBR sql table

sinks.name: InsertUnpvtMBRData
sinks.description: Create and insert unpivot MBR data in the corresponding table

transformations.name: UnpivotMBRData
transformations.description: Unpivot MBR Data to group by Period

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select distinct concat('toload/',MBR_Scope) as SourcePathFolder,
concat('archives/',MBR_Scope) as DestiPathFolder, MBR_FileName as FileName 
from  [@{pipeline().globalParameters.gODSSchemaName}].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesConfigTableName}]

properties.description: Move all import tables from the source systems

sqlReaderQuery.value: select  MBR_UnpvtTableName, CONCAT('P&L_FI_', MBR_Scope, '_', MBR_BU_Code) AS StgFinancialTableName  from  [@{pipeline().globalParameters.gODSSchemaName}].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesConfigTableName}]

select  MBR_UnpvtTableName, CONCAT('P&L_FI_', MBR_Scope, '_', MBR_BU_Code) AS StgFinancialTableName  from  [@{pipeline().globalParameters.gODSSchemaName}].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesConfigTableName}]
select  distinct concat('KPI_Pyramid_', MBR_Scope) AS StgKpiTableName  from  [@{pipeline().globalParameters.gODSSchemaName}].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesConfigTableName}]

dependsOn.activity: Get All KPI Pyramid ODS Tables

activities.name: Get All KPI Pyramid ODS Tables

sqlReaderQuery.value: select  distinct MBR_KPIPyramid_TableName,  concat('KPI_Pyramid_', MBR_Scope) as StgTableName from  [@{pipeline().globalParameters.gODSSchemaName}].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesConfigTableName}]

SELECT [MBR_Scope] as MBRScope,
    'toload/' + [MBR_Scope]  as MBRScope_Folder
  FROM [cfg].[@{pipeline().globalParameters.gSourcesTableName}]
WHERE [Active_fl] = 'Y'
